channel.title: CVE Feed for Brocade Communications Systems, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brocade Communications Systems, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2016-8202|2024-08-06T02:13:21.819Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- fibre%20channel%20san%20products%20running%20brocade%20fabric%20os%20%28fos%29.
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability in Brocade Fibre Channel SAN products running Brocade Fabric OS (FOS) releases earlier than v7.4.1d and v8.0.1b could allow an authenticated attacker to elevate the privileges of user accounts accessing the system via command line interface. With affected versions, non-root users can gain root access with a combination of shell commands and parameters.

item.title: CVE-2016-8209|2024-08-06T02:13:21.816Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- netiron%20xmr%2Fmlx%20and%20brocade%20ces%2Fcer%20on%20netiron
item.description: Improper checks for unusual or exceptional conditions in Brocade NetIron 05.8.00 and later releases up to and including 06.1.00, when the Management Module is continuously scanned on port 22, may allow attackers to cause a denial of service (crash and reload) of the management module.
